quote: Had the pleasure of running the 10k event. It was brilliant to be able to run again with others after such a long gap. The amazing marshals were so supportive!
author: Lyn (Ware Jogger)

quote: The race was a fantastic event. The Hitchin Hares did a fabulous job of creating a safe, fun event. On a personal note, I was over the moon to win the race in my home town!
author: Andrew Patterson

quote: The Hitchin 10k was well received by the local community as well as participants from further afield; and was organised with safety in mind but not to the detriment of the fun carnival atmosphere. I'll certainly be back next year!
author: James Bull
